text: The Music Lovers is a 1971 British biographical drama movie directed by Ken Russell and stars Glenda Jackson, Richard Chamberlain, Max Adrian, Christopher Gable, Kenneth Colley with direction from Enrique Pe√±a Nieto. It was distributed by United Artists and suffered from bad reviews and since become a cult movie. ==Other websites== * The Music Lovers at the Internet Movie Database *The Music Lovers at Trailers from Hell * Category:1971 drama movies Category:1970s biographical movies Category:1971 LGBT movies Category:British biographical movies Category:British drama movies Category:British LGBT movies Category:Movies directed by Ken Russell Category:Movies set in the 19th century Category:Movies about composers Category:Movies about classical music and musicians
title: The Music Lovers
